title: Mysterious Iquitos 4D/3N

summary.route: FLIGHT / IQUITOS – QUISTOCOCHA – AMAZON – PEDRITO FARM

itinerary.day: Day 01: Flight to Iquitos - City Tour

activities.text: Flight and arrival in Iquitos, airport reception and transfer to the hotel. Visit to the surroundings of Iquitos: squares, cathedrals, viewpoints. Free time.

Pick-up from your hotel and city tour in Iquitos with a local guide. Visit to the ACOBIA manatee conservation center and the Quistococha national zoo. Time to swim at the artificial beach. Return to the hotel.

Boat trip on the Amazon River, spotting pink river dolphins. Visit to the Yagua tribe to learn about their culture, dances, and blowgun. Lunch at a rustic lodge. Visit to Barrio Florido and walk to Pedrito Farm to see caimans, paiches, and Victoria regia. Return to Iquitos.
Breakfast. Free time to enjoy the hotel or go shopping. Transfer to the airport and end of the tour.

includes: 03 nights accommodation in *** hotel with pool
Tours as per itinerary (3 days of excursions)
Agency staff accompanying the entire trip
Entrance tickets to all tourist sites
